sentences.sentence: I was always a little in awe of at-aunt Stephina Roos.
sentences.translation: 我对斯蒂菲娜老姑总是怀着敬畏之情。

sentences.sentence: In 1984 Unisa conferred the MMus degree on John Roos cum laude.
